summary: The electoral battle is raging in Marseilles. The Corsican Clan, under the rule of the Orsini family, is being challenged by the next generation, younger gangsters who support the ... See full summary »
cast: Jean Yanne|Senta Berger|Sterling Hayden|Raymond Pellegrin|Gordon Mitchell|Claude Cerval|Daniel Ivernel|Giancarlo Sbragia|Michel Rocher|Sophie Boudet|Carlo Nell|Marcel Lupovici|André Rouyer|Jean Bouchaud|Roger Lumont|Annie Kerani|N'Guyen Tien Lap|Tadakatsu Shiga|Eva Saint-Paul|Cécile Vassort|Albert Augier|Bernard Fontaine|Pierre Rosso|Etienne Bierry
title: Los secuaces
